授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This seminar style class will conducted face to face. However, assignments/ homework, lesson resources and important class information will be provided on Edmodo. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. BYOD for face to face class- computer, tablet, or smartphone. Students will engage in active learning: working individually, in pairs, groups and as a whole class to discuss and examine global issues, develop cross-cultural awareness, and improve academic and language skills through end of unit presentations.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Outside of class:
- For all class periods you will be required to complete homework assignments. This will include reading (graded readers or supplementary articles), vocabulary study using Quizlet, textbook assignments, listening assignments, writing (journal responses and presentation templates/scripts), and oral presentation preparation. Be sure to attempt these assignments as they reinforce language, skills and assess knowledge of content covered in class.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1~2 hours doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I'm happy to speak to you.
